channel.title: 🏢 Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Jointly Modeling Inter- & Intra-Modality Dependencies for Multi-modal Learning
item.description: I2M2: A novel framework revolutionizes multi-modal learning by jointly modeling inter- and intra-modality dependencies, achieving superior performance across diverse real-world datasets.
